mapper.select: select r.challenge_no, r.challenge_review_no, r.content, r.created_dt, u.user_no user_No, u.id id, f.filepath from ftp_challenge_review r inner join ftp_user u on r.user_no=u.user_no left outer join ftp_challenge_review_file f on r.challenge_review_no=f.challenge_review_no order by r.challenge_review_no desc

select r.challenge_no, r.challenge_review_no, r.content, r.created_dt, u.user_no user_No, u.id id, f.filepath from ftp_challenge_review r inner join ftp_user u on r.user_no=u.user_no left outer join ftp_challenge_review_file f on r.challenge_review_no=f.challenge_review_no where r.challenge_no=#{challengeNo} order by r.challenge_review_no desc

select r.challenge_no, r.challenge_review_no, r.content, r.created_dt, u.user_no, u.id from ftp_challenge_review r inner join ftp_user u on r.user_no=u.user_no where r.challenge_review_no=#{challengeReviewNo}
